title: Odyssey
description:
Odyssey is the simplest way to run AI models locally on your Mac by building powerful workflows. With Odyssey, you can create remarkable art, get work done, and automate repetitive tasks with the power of AI, cutting-edge machine learning models, and advanced image- and text-processing algorithms. 

Since AI models run locally, your data is completely private and there are never any usage limits. This means that harnessing your Mac for generative AI is more accessible than ever before
